message.name: ERR_SEARCH_MINIMUM_SEARCH_CRITERIA_NOT_MET
message.locale: If not searching by Application Reference then the minimum search criteria are First Name or Last Name, Application Type and Status.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_CRITERIA_NO_RESULT
message.locale: No application could be found which matched the search criteria.

message.name: WARN_APP_TASK_SEARCH_NOT_IMPLEMENTED
message.locale: It is not possible to search for a task by application.
